metadata.description: MAG team's curated collection of Claude Code plugins for modern full-stack development with LLM performance tracking

plugins.name: frontend
plugins.description: Comprehensive frontend development toolkit with TypeScript, React 19, Vite, TanStack Router & Query v5, shadcn/ui. Features code-analysis integration via claudemem semantic search (replaces claude-context MCP), session-based artifact isolation, LLM performance tracking, shadcn/ui component library knowledge (60+ components), multi-model plan/code review (parallel, 3-5x speedup), 13 focused skills, intelligent workflow detection, and Chrome DevTools MCP debugging.

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: Deep code investigation with claudemem v0.9.0. NEW: Anti-pattern warnings prevent output truncation (head/tail/awk/sed). Built-in alternatives (--tokens, --page-size, --max-depth). AST analysis with PageRank, callers/callees tracing.

plugins.name: bun
plugins.description: Production-ready TypeScript backend development with Bun runtime. Includes specialized agents for backend development, API design, and DevOps. Features comprehensive best practices, tools integration (Biome, Prisma, Hono, Docker), testing workflows, and AWS ECS deployment guidance (2025).

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: Shared multi-agent coordination and workflow orchestration patterns for complex Claude Code workflows. Skills-only plugin providing proven patterns for parallel execution (3-5x speedup), dynamic model discovery, session-based artifact isolation, LLM performance tracking. NEW in v0.8.0: multi-backend routing docs, prefix collision awareness, safe model ID guidelines in multi-model-validation and proxy-mode-reference skills.

plugins.name: agentdev
plugins.description: Create, implement, and review Claude Code agents and commands with multi-model validation, LLM performance tracking, and session-based artifact isolation. Full-cycle development workflow: design (architect) → plan review → implementation (developer) → quality review (reviewer) → iteration. NEW in v1.3.0: PROXY_MODE error handling - never silently substitute models, prefix collision awareness, error report format.

plugins.name: seo
plugins.description: Comprehensive SEO toolkit with interactive /seo:start entry point for guided workflow discovery, keyword research, content optimization, technical audits, multi-agent workflows, and analytics integrations (GA4, GSC). Features multi-model parallel review, A/B alternative generation, E-E-A-T compliance validation, data-driven performance analysis, and five-role agent architecture (Analyst → Researcher → Writer → Editor → Data Analyst). v1.4.0: New /seo:start command - interactive entry point that understands user goals and routes to appropriate SEO commands.

plugins.name: video-editing
plugins.description: Professional video editing toolkit with FFmpeg operations, Whisper transcription, and Apple Final Cut Pro project generation. Features intelligent video analysis, automated transcription with timing sync, FCPXML timeline creation with markers, multi-format export, and comprehensive validation.

plugins.name: nanobanana
plugins.description: AI image generation and editing using Google Gemini 3 Pro Image API (Nano Banana Pro). Simple Node.js CLI with markdown styles, batch generation, reference image support, and comprehensive error handling with retry logic.
